1.title: Open Data Export Page
1.description: Tap the button below to go directly to the platform's data export page. You may need to log in first.

2.title: Select 'Some of your information'
2.description: Don't download everything — we only need your followers and following data to speed this up.

3.title: Check only 'Followers and following'
3.description: Uncheck all other options like messages or media. This makes your file much smaller.

4.title: ⚠️ Select JSON format
4.description: This is critical: Choose JSON, not HTML. HTML files will not work with our analyzer.

5.title: Choose 'All time' and tap 'Create files'
5.description: The platform will now start preparing your data. This can take anywhere from 5 minutes to a few hours.
5.alt: Step 5: Choose 'All time' and tap 'Create files'

6.title: Wait for email notification
6.description: Keep an eye on your inbox (and spam folder!). You'll get an email when your file is ready to download.

7.title: Download the ZIP file
7.description: Download the file to your device. Once you have it, you're ready to analyze it here!

8.title: Upload & Reveal Results
8.description: Head back here, upload your ZIP file, and instantly see who unfollowed you and more!
